snippet: Art Pope, a businessman with a chain of discount stores and now the state’s budget director, has used his personal fortune to further a conservative agenda.
abstract: Art Pope, owner of chain of discount stores in North Carolina and state’s budget director, is accused of using his personal fortune to further a conservative agenda; liberal groups say he supported policies that hurt the store’s poor and minority shoppers; more than a dozen protests are planned outside his stores to show disdain for state's abrupt swing to the right.
lead_paragraph: Art Pope, a businessman with a chain of discount stores and now the state’s budget director, has used his personal fortune to further a conservative agenda.
